summary: A comprehensive test suite for the GroupViT model that validates its initialization, configuration loading, pretrained weight loading, forward pass behavior, handling of hidden states and input embeddings, gradient tracking, and equivalence between PyTorch and TensorFlow implementations, including TorchScript conversion.
business_intent: Guarantee the functional correctness, crossâ€‘framework consistency, and regression safety of the GroupViT architecture before release or integration into production pipelines.
